page.title: 13Social Care
page.content: Here are some care organisations: Dunbar Hospital, Naver House Residential and Care; Pop in Parlour tea for elderly: Sheltered housing in Oldfield Court with warden. We decided to interview Dunbar Hospital. Here is the information we collected. The Hospital which serves the Thurso area is Dunbar Hospital. Patients normally stay for 6-10 days.The hospital has its own outpatients unit, kitchen and laundry. The hospital is for ladies. The most common operation is a hysterectomy. The number of babies born this year was 155, 82 boys,73 girls. Food costs up to Â£1200 which is financed by Highland Health Board. There were no deaths this year. The staff consists of 33 nurses, 1 cook, 7 domestics, 2 physiotherapists and 1 personal secretary. There were 196 patients this year.
